attributes.review:
I am extremely appalled at the behavior of our president let alone his cabinet. That aside, this app is completely and utterly unusable! Itâ€™s confusing. There is no walk around/tutorial on how to use. Itâ€™s not the best app Iâ€™ve used. Trump should worry about being a man of all the people and not just the privileged few. 

Now circling back. Iâ€™m dissatisfied with his presidency and hope he does not win again if life will remain the same. I truly hope he fixes his behavior and begins to act dignified. Heâ€™s supposed to stand for the people but heâ€™s constantly working to divide the country. I was a supporter once upon a time but now Iâ€™ve began to see things differently. 

He lacks empathy for others! Itâ€™s quite scary! I hope he begins to actually portray the characteristics of Jesus Christ. Being that heâ€™s a self proclaimed Christian. He is making us look bad. 

For his current supporters I urge you to just listen for once instead of arguing to win. Listen and maybe youâ€™ll learn. Feel!!! Please donâ€™t let your hearts become cold. Anger, violence, hatred, and evil will only ruin this country. Not make it great again, it was never great to begin with. It was productive but not great. 

Things need to change. We shouldnâ€™t gain at the expense of others. Thatâ€™s not Godly, nor is it humane. Step outside of yourself for once and listen. 

God bless! Trust in God and change! Jesus is king! Him alone, not you, not me!

attributes.review: The first of many severe issues occurred when I went to download the app. My phone had never had this problem before, but the app absolutely refused to download and I could not access the app store without being brought back to the home screen. I restarted my phone many times but could not seem to fix it. After about a day it finally loaded, but had the same issue with kicking me out immediately. Once again I tried to troubleshoot these issues, but to no avail. I canâ€™t imagine what other problems occur within the app as well, given the trouble I went through to download it. Just a disclaimer, the other apps on my phone (other than this one and the app store) were working fine, leading me to believe that it is a problem with this app specifically. I donâ€™t recommend even trying to download it, itâ€™s a huge waste of time when you could just find other less biased sources of information.
